analysis.description: SmartRoulette.isBitSet (/unique_chucks/5/0x75a32cc1bfa5c32fe428dea7c40693d7004884da.sol#143-149) is declared view but contains assembly code

SmartRoulette.checkGameResult (/unique_chucks/5/0x75a32cc1bfa5c32fe428dea7c40693d7004884da.sol#407-429) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- SmartRoulette.gambles

SmartRoulette.placeBet (/unique_chucks/5/0x75a32cc1bfa5c32fe428dea7c40693d7004884da.sol#262-332) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- gambles.length != 0 && block.number == gambles[gambles.length - 1].blockNumber

SmartRoulette.getGameResult has external calls inside a loop:
	- winMul = winMatrix.getCoeff(getIndex(i,game.wheelResult)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x75a32cc1bfa5c32fe428dea7c40693d7004884da.sol#438)

SmartRoulette.isBitSet uses assembly (/unique_chucks/5/0x75a32cc1bfa5c32fe428dea7c40693d7004884da.sol#143-149)
	- /unique_chucks/5/0x75a32cc1bfa5c32fe428dea7c40693d7004884da.sol#148-149
